text:
I use to use proxy feature with 1.3x version of apache and I decided to switch 
to version 2 since apache starting from the 1.3.22 version introduced problem 
with cookies. Now, I'm not able even to pass through the proxy. I got 'Access 
forbiden' to any site I try to access.
#<Proxy *>
#    Order deny,allow
#    Deny from all
#    Allow from all
#</Proxy>
restriction is turned off.
I notice that 'Add module' ('Load' is there) directive is missing in Appache 2.
creator: maksogorki@hotmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
You need to loadmodule mod_proxy_http, _ftp or _connect depending on the methods
you wish to proxy, in addition to mod_proxy itself (which is only the core.)

The addmodule directive no longer exists, nor is it needed in 2.0.

But this isn't a bug - configuration issues should be directed to the
users mailing lists.
